column5: We went out from North Bay to the islands tonite for a little fun and on the first fish we caught was a lamprey sucking on a nice size eye.We didn't know these were in Nippissing so it was a bit of a surprise.Needless to say it didn't live long.On a better note we got 11 jumbo perch-5 eyes and an OOS bass.   vance

I hope to do as well when I get up there for the weekend.  As a side note not all Lamprey are the invasive Sea Lamprey. What you had may have been one of the native lampreys of Ontario, some of which are endangered. I'm guessing it was likely a Silver Lamprey and not (though not impossible) a Sea Lamprey.
Thanks for the answer guys I just didn't realize that they were this far north.You learn something new every day:)  vance
lampreys creep the hell out of me there like a brain slug or something
